channel.title: Civil Protection: Christmas Community Outreach
channel.description:
So, just in time for Valve-time Christmas, Ross Scott of Accursed Farms has released [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f6lmVJ7KubY']Civil Protection: Christmas Community Outreach[/url].
I haven't watched it as of this posting but it should be good. Can't wait to watch. :slight_smile:

item.title: Civil Protection: Christmas Community Outreach

item.description:
Yeah, and according to his site hes done with the source engine anyway, so i dont expect see to much more of this for a while. I prefer freemans mind, but yeah.

item.title: Civil Protection: Christmas Community Outreach
item.dc:creator: Power_Dust
item.description:
Well, it’s okay, but not too good for the amount of time he took for that one. I know he named a couple of reasons for the massive delay but there are better ones in my opinion, like “On a rail”. :rolleyes:
